83a1(khri brgyad): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa ni rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag
83a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub
83a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med
83a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /
83a5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i dben pa ni rnam par shes pa'i dben pas stong ste/ rnam par shes
83a6(khri brgyad): pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang dben pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang dben pa nyid lags dben pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags pa'i slad
83a7(khri brgyad): du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
83a8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ bcom
83b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i
83b2(khri brgyad): slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
83b3(khri brgyad): dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo
83b4(khri brgyad): thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgo ma lags la/ stong pa nyid
83b5(khri brgyad): las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
83b6(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi
83b7(khri brgyad): mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te tshor ba
83b8(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du
84a1(khri brgyad): bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
84a2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
84a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags
84a4(khri brgyad): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha
84a5(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
84a6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin
84a7(khri brgyad): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag ba'i mtha' la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab
84a8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
84b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /
84b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi
84b3(khri brgyad): yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ gzugs ma lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rang
84b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags
84b5(khri brgyad): pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub
84b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas chos gang la yang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /
84b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ste/ rgya che ba phul du bgyi ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ nges pa mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang /
84b8(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /rnam pa thams cad
85a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
85a2(khri brgyad): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
85a3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni
85a4(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /mtshan ma gang lags she na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba
85a5(khri brgyad): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna
85a6(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i 'dus
85a7(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /rna ba'i
85a8(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
85b1(khri brgyad): ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ /sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /ma rig pa ni mtshan
85b2(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so/ /dran pa nye bar
85b3(khri brgyad): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
85b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
85b5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /tha dad pa brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags
85b6(khri brgyad): so/ /mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba
85b7(khri brgyad): zhig lags na ni kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs de bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur lags so/ /dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa
85b8(khri brgyad): dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste/ de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so/ /de ltar de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / gzung
86a1(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis par bzung bar bgyi ba lags te/ kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su
86a2(khri brgyad): ma bzung / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po
86a3(khri brgyad): ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon
86a4(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs
86a5(khri brgyad): par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes
86a6(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
86a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi rol du yang
86a8(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du
86b1(khri brgyad): yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang
86b2(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam grangs 'di la kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur
86b3(khri brgyad): te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas/ des chos gang yang
86b4(khri brgyad): mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so/ /chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang / gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/
86b5(khri brgyad): gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su
86b6(khri brgyad): gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang
86b7(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol du mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos
86b8(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs
87a1(khri brgyad): pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang
87a2(khri brgyad): ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin
87a3(khri brgyad): pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol du mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bdun pa/ bcom ldan
87a4(khri brgyad): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes
87a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/ /de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang
87a6(khri brgyad): lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
87a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
87a8(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
87b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
87b2(khri brgyad): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
87b3(khri brgyad): du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
87b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
87b5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
87b6(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
87b7(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med
87b8(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi
88a1(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'
88a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems
88a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
88a4(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /
88a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam
88a6(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi
88a7(khri brgyad): chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
88a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /
88b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/
88b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i
88b3(khri brgyad): mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid
88b4(khri brgyad): dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i
88b5(khri brgyad): bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de
88b6(khri brgyad): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad
88b7(khri brgyad): ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/
88b8(khri brgyad): de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i
89a1(khri brgyad): mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med
89a2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa
89a3(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par
89a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa
89a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
89a6(khri brgyad): pa'i sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing / rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o/ /de sems can rnams yongs
89a7(khri brgyad): su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang
89a8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
89b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ /
89b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
89b3(khri brgyad): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
89b4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te
89b5(khri brgyad): gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
89b6(khri brgyad): shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
89b7(khri brgyad): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te
89b8(khri brgyad): gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis
90a1(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
90a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
90a3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /
90a5(khri brgyad): mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
90a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa'
90a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi
90a8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
90b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
90b2(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/
90b3(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
90b4(khri brgyad): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ rna
90b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas
90b6(khri brgyad): shing kun du shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te
90b7(khri brgyad): reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug
90b8(khri brgyad): bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug
91a1(khri brgyad): bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ mig lnga dang /
91a2(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
91a3(khri brgyad): gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas
91a4(khri brgyad): shing kun du shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
91a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi 'thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo zhes kho bo smra'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
91a6(khri brgyad): mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
91a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
91a8(khri brgyad): la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/
91b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag
91b2(khri brgyad): ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang /
91b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi
91b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang /
91b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar
91b6(khri brgyad): mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa
91b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang
91b8(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
92a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam
92a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang
92a3(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
92a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/
92a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la
92a6(khri brgyad): mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
92a7(khri brgyad): skal ba yod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /
92a8(khri brgyad): khas len kyang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khas len pa yang ma yin/ khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
92b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i
92b2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes
92b3(khri brgyad): bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin
92b4(khri brgyad): du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du
92b5(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/ tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/
92b6(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
92b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin
92b8(khri brgyad): gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
93a1(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
93a2(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
93a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang
93a4(khri brgyad): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba
93a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes
93a6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas
93a7(khri brgyad): la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon
93a8(khri brgyad): mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed
93b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan
93b2(khri brgyad): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge
93b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa
93b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa
93b5(khri brgyad): dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi
93b6(khri brgyad): 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
93b7(khri brgyad): dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
93b8(khri brgyad): bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa
94a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya
94a2(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam
94a3(khri brgyad): par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
94a4(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
94a5(khri brgyad): g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
94a6(khri brgyad): dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
94a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med
94a8(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya
94b1(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
94b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
94b3(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
94b4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
94b5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
94b6(khri brgyad): bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes
94b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med pa la
94b8(khri brgyad): brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha'
95a1(khri brgyad): ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems
95a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge
95a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
95a4(khri brgyad): chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang
95a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor kyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
95a6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
95a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95a8(khri brgyad): po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug
95b1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
95b2(khri brgyad): 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
95b3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhig /byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
95b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'
95b5(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe
95b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun du shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun du shes pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras
95b7(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun du shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis
95b8(khri brgyad): smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing / kun du mi shes so/ /shA ri'i
96a1(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ des rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med
96a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu
96a3(khri brgyad): bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bsam
96a4(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs
96a5(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
96a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
96a7(khri brgyad): ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
96a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/ de yang mi
96b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
96b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i
96b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
96b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing
96b5(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir
96b6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag
96b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom
96b8(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang
97a1(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa
97a2(khri brgyad): dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa
97a3(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa
97a4(khri brgyad): so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
97a5(khri brgyad): ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
97a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
97a7(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams yod pa ma
97a8(khri brgyad): yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas
97b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag
97b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar
97b3(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag
97b4(khri brgyad): ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no/ /ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing
97b5(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de dag ni
97b6(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /
97b7(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni ma dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya ba ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar
97b8(khri brgyad): dag la ma dad pa yin no/ /de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
98a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa
98a2(khri brgyad): rnams shes bya'o/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa
98a3(khri brgyad): yin no/ /mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon
98a4(khri brgyad): par zhen pa yin no/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /
98a5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
98a6(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
98a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
98a8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas
98b1(khri brgyad): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
98b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags nas mngon
98b3(khri brgyad): par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/
98b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
98b5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
98b6(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
98b7(khri brgyad): pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b8(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
99a1(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang
99a2(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
99a3(khri brgyad): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges
99a4(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i
99a5(khri brgyad): le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi
99a6(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/
99a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs
99a8(khri brgyad): nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs
99b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
99b2(khri brgyad): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig /rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
99b3(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
99b4(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba dang sna dang /
99b5(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin
99b6(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
99b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
99b8(khri brgyad): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
100a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin
100a2(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid
100a3(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom
100a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
100a5(khri brgyad): de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin
100a6(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
100a7(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor
100a8(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab
100b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
100b2(khri brgyad): gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags
100b3(khri brgyad): la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so/ /bcom
100b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma
100b5(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang / dri dang ro dang /
100b6(khri brgyad): reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par
100b7(khri brgyad): shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i
100b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
101a1(khri brgyad): lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg
101a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
101a3(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang
101a4(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
101a5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/
101a6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te
101a7(khri brgyad): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan
101a8(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
101b1(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang
101b2(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
101b3(khri brgyad): lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan
101b4(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma
101b5(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan
101b6(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi
101b7(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so/ /bcom ldan
101b8(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/ /
102a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
102a2(khri brgyad): mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /
102a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par
102a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
102a5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po
102a6(khri brgyad): lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
102a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod
102a8(khri brgyad): dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang gdags
102b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
102b2(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
102b3(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi
102b4(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
102b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
102b6(khri brgyad): bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
102b7(khri brgyad): du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
