102b8(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su
103a1(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges
103a2(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis
103a3(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /
103a4(khri brgyad): smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
103a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu
103a6(khri brgyad): ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis
103a7(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags
103a8(khri brgyad): te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis
103b1(khri brgyad): dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na
103b2(khri brgyad): skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi
103b3(khri brgyad): mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang
103b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
103b5(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
103b6(khri brgyad): ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du
103b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
103b8(khri brgyad): gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa
104a1(khri brgyad): dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal
104a2(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de
104a3(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
104a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
104a5(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
104a6(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
104a7(khri brgyad): dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /
104a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes
104b1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la
104b2(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
104b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
104b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma
104b5(khri brgyad): med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor
104b6(khri brgyad): rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor
104b7(khri brgyad): rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so/ /rab
104b8(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
105a1(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya
105a2(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
105a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
105a4(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan bar bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub
105a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /
105a6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /
105a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes
105a8(khri brgyad): bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya
105b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
105b2(khri brgyad): gyis byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par
105b3(khri brgyad): shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
105b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
105b5(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
105b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis
105b8(khri brgyad): gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /
106a1(khri brgyad): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
106a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med
106a3(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi
106a4(khri brgyad): 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
106a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar tu gcod par byed pa
106a6(khri brgyad): dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing
106a7(khri brgyad): dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid
106a8(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
106b1(khri brgyad): kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid
106b2(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams
106b3(khri brgyad): stong pa ma yin gyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
106b4(khri brgyad): kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
106b5(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
106b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma
106b7(khri brgyad): yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ /mig
106b8(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
107a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
107a2(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
107a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam gyi stong pa nyid
107a4(khri brgyad): kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lam mo/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin
107a5(khri brgyad): gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
107a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
107a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces
107b1(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin
107b2(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
107b3(khri brgyad): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
107b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon
107b5(khri brgyad): pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
107b6(khri brgyad): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
107b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam
107b8(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /
108a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
108a2(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
108a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
108a4(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
108a5(khri brgyad): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
108a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
108a7(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs
108a8(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos
108b1(khri brgyad): mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
108b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni
108b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /
108b4(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
108b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
108b6(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang lus dang /
108b7(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
108b8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad
109a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab
109a2(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa
109a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
109a4(khri brgyad): lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi
109a5(khri brgyad): bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
109a6(khri brgyad): sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad
109a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis
109a8(khri brgyad): yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa
109b1(khri brgyad): thabs la mi mkhas pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags bcom
109b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol du
109b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
109b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
109b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs
109b6(khri brgyad): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
109b7(khri brgyad): byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa
109b8(khri brgyad): nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig
110a1(khri brgyad): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa
110a2(khri brgyad): nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong
110a3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang /
110a4(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna
110a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
110a6(khri brgyad): byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom
110a7(khri brgyad): sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
110a8(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
110b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/
110b2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
110b3(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing / de dag kyang
110b4(khri brgyad): dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab
110b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par
110b6(khri brgyad): mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
110b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni
110b8(khri brgyad): snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /bsgom par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /
111a1(khri brgyad): gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul
111a2(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
111a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byed du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung tu 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
111a4(khri brgyad): pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims
111a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/
111a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can
111a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi cha byad tu bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung
111a8(khri brgyad): ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing /
111b1(khri brgyad): bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
111b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi
111b3(khri brgyad): sems cung zad kyang med do/ /khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no/ /khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag
111b4(khri brgyad): de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang
111b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag
111b6(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
111b7(khri brgyad): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus
111b8(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
112a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
112a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
112a3(khri brgyad): du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
112a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
112a5(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
112a6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub
112a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
112a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag
112b1(khri brgyad): mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
112b2(khri brgyad): po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed do zhes bdud kyi las
112b3(khri brgyad): de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing
112b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang 'bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
112b5(khri brgyad): rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod
112b6(khri brgyad): kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor
112b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du
112b8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par
113a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon
113a2(khri brgyad): sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
113a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
113a4(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna
113a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
113a6(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
113a7(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
113a8(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
113b1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
113b2(khri brgyad): dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud
113b3(khri brgyad): kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
113b4(khri brgyad): las/ sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
113b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i
113b6(khri brgyad): don to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub dang / sems dpa' la skye ba dang yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/
113b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' la yang gzhi med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
113b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /
114a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /
114a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
114a3(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa
114a4(khri brgyad): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba
114a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i
114a6(khri brgyad): don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang /
114a7(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
114a8(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /
114b1(khri brgyad): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
114b2(khri brgyad): kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
114b3(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs
114b4(khri brgyad): so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu
114b5(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
114b6(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
114b7(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs
114b8(khri brgyad): so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
115a1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
115a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
115a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
115a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do/ /dngos po med
115a5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/ /rab
115a6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag
115a7(khri brgyad): gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
115a8(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
115b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
115b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /
115b3(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
115b4(khri brgyad): gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi
115b5(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab
115b6(khri brgyad): 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
115b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams
115b8(khri brgyad): kyi gzhi med do/ /skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med
116a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
116a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon
116a3(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di
116a4(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do/ /rab
116a5(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
116a6(khri brgyad): gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
116a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i
116a8(khri brgyad): don med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
116b1(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
116b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
116b3(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de
116b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin du rnam par dag pa
116b5(khri brgyad): la gzhi med do/ /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
116b6(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
116b7(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
116b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul
117a1(khri brgyad): khrims la 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor
117a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng pa'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par
117a3(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do/ /
117a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
117a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha
117a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
117b1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag
117b2(khri brgyad): thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
117b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
117b4(khri brgyad): thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong
117b5(khri brgyad): du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang
117b6(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go/ /rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/
117b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no/ /
117b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i
118a1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong tu 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
118a2(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du
118a3(khri brgyad): shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /
118a4(khri brgyad): rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes
118a5(khri brgyad): su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa
118a6(khri brgyad): rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan
118a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa
118a8(khri brgyad): dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te rab 'byor
118b1(khri brgyad): de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan
118b2(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med
118b3(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /
118b4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad
118b5(khri brgyad): dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par
118b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
118b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
118b8(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun
119a1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
119a2(khri brgyad): rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /
119a3(khri brgyad): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las
119a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
119a5(khri brgyad): ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
119a6(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam
119a7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
119a8(khri brgyad): mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
119b1(khri brgyad): pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po
119b2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
119b3(khri brgyad): pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la
119b4(khri brgyad): gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas
119b5(khri brgyad): bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
119b6(khri brgyad): par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /
119b7(khri brgyad): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
119b8(khri brgyad): shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du
120a1(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs
120a2(khri brgyad): nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
120a3(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
120a4(khri brgyad): phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /
120a5(khri brgyad): de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
120a6(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /
120a7(khri brgyad): de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
120a8(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang /
120b1(khri brgyad): gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
120b2(khri brgyad): chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
120b3(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu
120b4(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ /de la byang chub
120b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab
120b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
120b7(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur
120b8(khri brgyad): bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs
121a1(khri brgyad): chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang /
121a2(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
121a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ /rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
121a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/
121a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag
121a6(khri brgyad): gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems cad thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /
121a7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis
121a8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub
121b1(khri brgyad): pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed
121b2(khri brgyad): pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor
121b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong
121b4(khri brgyad): bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam tu sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong tu sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis
121b5(khri brgyad): s ems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems
121b6(khri brgyad): c an dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems
121b7(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /phyis 'dod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags
121b8(khri brgyad): la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas
122a1(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
122a2(khri brgyad): sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags
122a3(khri brgyad): kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can
122a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a5(khri brgyad): po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /
122a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya
122a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
122a8(khri brgyad): phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi
122b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos kun du dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la kun du
122b2(khri brgyad): dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod
122b3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun du dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang / phan yon du lta
122b4(khri brgyad): ba ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes
122b5(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
122b6(khri brgyad): gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen
122b7(khri brgyad): po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub
122b8(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /
123a1(khri brgyad): sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/
123a2(khri brgyad): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin
123a3(khri brgyad): par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems
123a4(khri brgyad): can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gcig
123a5(khri brgyad): pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag
