123a6(khri brgyad): kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu
123a7(khri brgyad): lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang /
123a8(khri brgyad): byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang /
123b1(khri brgyad): med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched tu lta ba dang / bden par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /
123b2(khri brgyad): stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs
123b3(khri brgyad): rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad tu/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/
123b4(khri brgyad): don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
123b5(khri brgyad): gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan
123b6(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
123b7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
123b8(khri brgyad): 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
124a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
124a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig /rab 'byor gyis
124a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis
124a4(khri brgyad): pas/ don des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/
124a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su
124a6(khri brgyad): mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /
124a7(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la yang skye ba
124a8(khri brgyad): 'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye
124b1(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/
124b2(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang
124b3(khri brgyad): mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su
124b4(khri brgyad): gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
124b5(khri brgyad): chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med
124b6(khri brgyad): do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
124b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing / khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi
124b8(khri brgyad): sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang
125a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
125a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis
125a3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
125a4(khri brgyad): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
125a5(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
125a6(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs
125a7(khri brgyad): su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing
125a8(khri brgyad): khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
125b1(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa
125b2(khri brgyad): med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa
125b3(khri brgyad): yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
125b4(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab
125b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa
125b6(khri brgyad): yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
125b7(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
125b8(khri brgyad): de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba
126a1(khri brgyad): med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste
126a2(khri brgyad): bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
126a3(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems
126a4(khri brgyad): can chen po de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /
126a5(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/
126a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems
126a7(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can
126a8(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad
126b1(khri brgyad): kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson
126b2(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha
126b3(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do/ /nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
126b4(khri brgyad): pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig
126b5(khri brgyad): ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang
126b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin
126b7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
126b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
127a1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
127a2(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
127a3(khri brgyad): du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos
127a4(khri brgyad): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
127a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
127a6(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
127a7(khri brgyad): ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
127a8(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems
127b1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
127b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi
127b3(khri brgyad): dmigs len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
127b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol du phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
127b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa
127b6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni
127b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
127b8(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul
128a1(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
128a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
128a3(khri brgyad): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
128a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa
128a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na
128a6(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
128a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis
128a8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
128b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
128b2(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
128b3(khri brgyad): gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
128b4(khri brgyad): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
128b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
128b6(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na
128b7(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
128b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba
129a1(khri brgyad): dag gis/ sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
129a2(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
129a3(khri brgyad): yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/
129a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
129a5(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
129a6(khri brgyad): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
129a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
129a8(khri brgyad): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang
129b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing / chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog
129b2(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
129b3(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
129b4(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams
129b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
129b6(khri brgyad): bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
129b7(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
129b8(khri brgyad): du phyin pa bsgom zhing / de pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang /
130a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med
130a2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
130a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms
130a4(khri brgyad): par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro myang
130a5(khri brgyad): bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par rig par
130a6(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
130a7(khri brgyad): med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po
130a8(khri brgyad): yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs
130b1(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
130b2(khri brgyad): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched tu brjod pa ched tu rjod cing bsngags pa yang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa yang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bus
130b3(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras
130b4(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben
130b5(khri brgyad): pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par
130b6(khri brgyad): byas te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
130b7(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis
130b8(khri brgyad): pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha'
131a1(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
131a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa
131a3(khri brgyad): dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med
131a4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong
131a5(khri brgyad): ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
131a6(khri brgyad): bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
131a7(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan
131a8(khri brgyad): dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub
131b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
131b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
131b3(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
131b4(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig
131b5(khri brgyad): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /yang byang chub
131b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
131b7(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang rjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/ rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub
131b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan
132a1(khri brgyad): dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la yang gnas la 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems
132a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/
132a3(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang
132a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa
132a5(khri brgyad): ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
132a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par
132a7(khri brgyad): 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang
132a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan
132b1(khri brgyad): dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong
132b2(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
132b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
132b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
132b5(khri brgyad): bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
132b6(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams
132b7(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /
132b8(khri brgyad): snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi
133a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
133a2(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
133a3(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/ /byang chub sems
133a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu
133a5(khri brgyad): 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing / 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
133a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
133a8(khri brgyad): pa de dag la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa
133b1(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
133b2(khri brgyad): dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/ de yang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i
133b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/
133b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
133b5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang /
133b6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
133b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing
133b8(khri brgyad): mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par
134a1(khri brgyad): zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug
134a2(khri brgyad): bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba
134a3(khri brgyad): dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang
134a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /ma
134a5(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug / da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa yang mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems
134a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134a7(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug / gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang ma
134a8(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
134b1(khri brgyad): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /
134b2(khri brgyad): zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa
134b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
134b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems
134b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du
134b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs
134b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la
134b8(khri brgyad): yang dag par gnas pa yang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha
135a1(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab
135a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir nang stong
135a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/
135a4(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
135a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /
135a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /
135a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
135a8(khri brgyad): bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
135b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ tha snyad tsam du zad par shes so/ /
135b2(khri brgyad): gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de yang ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ tshor
135b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam tu zad do/ /mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid
135b4(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang /
135b5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid
135b6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam tu zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir sangs
135b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
135b8(khri brgyad): mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni ming tsam tu zad do/ /zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang
136a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
136a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
136a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang tu byed do/ /bla mar byed do/ /ri mor byed do/ /mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
136a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par
136a5(khri brgyad): byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ci lta bus
136a6(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi don byed nus pa de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des rnam
136a7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
136a8(khri brgyad): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
136b1(khri brgyad): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136b2(khri brgyad): 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po la zhon nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho
136b3(khri brgyad): dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags
136b4(khri brgyad): pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
136b5(khri brgyad): bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad
136b6(khri brgyad): stong pa las/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan
136b7(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos/ go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136b8(khri brgyad): go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i
137a1(khri brgyad): go cha bgos/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
137a2(khri brgyad): go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med
137a3(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad
137a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams
137a5(khri brgyad): su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di
137a6(khri brgyad): skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/
137a7(khri brgyad): bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod
137a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
137b1(khri brgyad): rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o/ /de bzhin du shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
137b2(khri brgyad): snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu
137b3(khri brgyad): zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
137b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas
137b5(khri brgyad): byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing / bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /mir skyes nas sangs rgyas
137b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
137b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob
137b8(khri brgyad): ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/ des mngon par sprul nas/
138a1(khri brgyad): sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba
138a2(khri brgyad): de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams
138a3(khri brgyad): dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
138a4(khri brgyad): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa
138a5(khri brgyad): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab
138a6(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ go cha chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum
138a7(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /des 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas
138a8(khri brgyad): 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do/ /de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang /
138b1(khri brgyad): bgo ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do/ /des zas 'dod pa
138b2(khri brgyad): rnams la zas byin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de
138b3(khri brgyad): thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob
138b4(khri brgyad): ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji
138b5(khri brgyad): snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
138b6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar
138b7(khri brgyad): du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138b8(khri brgyad): po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye ste/ 'khor
139a1(khri brgyad): los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god
139a2(khri brgyad): par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
139a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal
139a4(khri brgyad): po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
139a5(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
139a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi
139a7(khri brgyad): lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi
139a8(khri brgyad): bar dag la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
139b1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
139b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
139b3(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga'
139b4(khri brgyad): yang bskyed par mi bya'o snyam zhing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal
139b5(khri brgyad): po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar zhing bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga'
139b6(khri brgyad): yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
139b8(khri brgyad): 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
140a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /
140a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140a3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de
140a4(khri brgyad): 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye po phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/
140a5(khri brgyad): lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang /
140a6(khri brgyad): sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
140a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang lus dang
140a8(khri brgyad): sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
140b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
140b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
140b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/ rnam par
140b4(khri brgyad): g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang
140b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
140b6(khri brgyad): bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po
140b7(khri brgyad): che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi
140b8(khri brgyad): slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
141a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bsam
141a2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
141a3(khri brgyad): po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing
141a4(khri brgyad): 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud
141a5(khri brgyad): de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu
141a6(khri brgyad): rol lam/ pha rol mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du
141a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i
141a8(khri brgyad): tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga'
141b1(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
141b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/
141b3(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
141b4(khri brgyad): pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can dag
141b5(khri brgyad): kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ /de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa
141b6(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/
141b7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
141b8(khri brgyad): yang pha rol du phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi
142a1(khri brgyad): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i
142a2(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/ /de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
142a3(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan
142a4(khri brgyad): pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol du phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di
142a5(khri brgyad): lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin
142a6(khri brgyad): du bcug cing btsud de/ bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol du phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam
142a7(khri brgyad): 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar
142a8(khri brgyad): phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol du phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol du phyin
142b1(khri brgyad): pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
142b2(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/
142b3(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
142b4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
142b5(khri brgyad): rnams la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems
142b6(khri brgyad): can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
142b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de
142b8(khri brgyad): la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol du phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
143a1(khri brgyad): la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
143a2(khri brgyad): bu la dgod par bya'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
143a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen
143a4(khri brgyad): po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol du phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
143a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
143a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol du phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams
143a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'
143a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can 'ga'i don
143b1(khri brgyad): gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos
143b2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar
143b3(khri brgyad): bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor
