164a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas
164a4(khri brgyad): so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du mi ro bor ba/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon pa 'am/ bya rog rnams za zhing 'dug
164a5(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ go bo dang / chun lag dang / bya rgod dang / skyugs za dang / spyang ku dang / wa dang / khyi dag gam/ srog chags kyi rigs gang yang rung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag za zhing 'dug pa dag mthong ba na de lus 'di yang
164a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164a7(khri brgyad): rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
164a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du mi ro bor ba rnam par zos pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / mnam pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin
164b1(khri brgyad): can yin te/ chos nyid 'di dang ma bral bas yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan
164b2(khri brgyad): pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
164b3(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du keng rus sha dang / khrag ra ri chags shing rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba dag mthong ba na/ de la lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos
164b4(khri brgyad): nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no/ /zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten
164b5(khri brgyad): la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod
164b6(khri brgyad): du keng rus sha dang khrag med cing rgyus pas ma 'brel ba/ dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma
164b7(khri brgyad): bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab
164b8(khri brgyad): sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod
165a1(khri brgyad): du keng rus zungs med cing gyes te/ dung sa la gtor ba lta bu dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral
165a2(khri brgyad): ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems
165a3(khri brgyad): dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du rus pa
165a4(khri brgyad): rnams sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor te/ rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ rje ngar gyi rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ dpyi'i rus pa
165a5(khri brgyad): rnams kyang gzhan na/ sgal tshigs rnams kyang gzhan na/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ dpung pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ mgo bo'i thod pa
165a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyang gzhan na 'dug pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can nam/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor
165a7(khri brgyad): bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes
165a8(khri brgyad): su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/
165b1(khri brgyad): lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
165b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
165b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ sngo ba thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zags shing brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'dra bar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos
165b4(khri brgyad): can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa
165b5(khri brgyad): shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas
165b6(khri brgyad): so/ /nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /de bzhin du rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ tshor ba rnams
165b7(khri brgyad): dang / sems dang / chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
165b8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa
166a1(khri brgyad): rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir
166a2(khri brgyad): 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing / yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus
166a3(khri brgyad): rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / mi brjed pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs
166a4(khri brgyad): par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jog ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
166a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rab
166a6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
166a7(khri brgyad): pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang
166a8(khri brgyad): bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166b1(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dbang po lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran
166b2(khri brgyad): pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
166b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so/ /de yang mi
166b4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/
166b5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
166b6(khri brgyad): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la
166b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
166b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i
167a1(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
167a2(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin
167a3(khri brgyad): no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
167a4(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas
167a5(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i
167a6(khri brgyad): sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed
167a7(khri brgyad): pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ byang chub
167a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
167b1(khri brgyad): po ni 'di lta ste/ shes pa bcu gcig go/ /bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes
167b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal
167b3(khri brgyad): mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog
167b4(khri brgyad): pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin
167b5(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid par 'gro
167b6(khri brgyad): ba mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po rnams bcos mar yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/ mig
167b7(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag par shes pa ste/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa
167b8(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems sems kyis shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la yongs su 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa dang / yongs su zad pa shes
168a1(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
168a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi shes
168a3(khri brgyad): pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma
168a4(khri brgyad): gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po snang ba med pa/ dregs pa 'dul ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes
168a5(khri brgyad): pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag kun shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
168a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ mi slob pa'i gang zag dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
168a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
168a8(khri brgyad): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /
168b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum mo/ /gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog
168b2(khri brgyad): pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod
168b3(khri brgyad): pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de ni
168b4(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa
168b5(khri brgyad): med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin
168b6(khri brgyad): pa dag ste/ de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
168b7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rjes su dran pa bcu'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /
168b8(khri brgyad): gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /
169a1(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su dran par byed de/ rab 'byor rjes su dran pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor
169a2(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis
169a3(khri brgyad): pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas
169a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod
169a5(khri brgyad): pa med pa/ shin tu bsgom pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag
169a7(khri brgyad): las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas
169a8(khri brgyad): pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
169b1(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de
169b2(khri brgyad): dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug
169b3(khri brgyad): bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs
169b4(khri brgyad): nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/
169b5(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna
169b6(khri brgyad): tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
169b7(khri brgyad): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
169b8(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes
170a1(khri brgyad): med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
170a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
170a3(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das
170a4(khri brgyad): te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
170a5(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te
170a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
170a7(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun
170a8(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rab 'byor
170b1(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
170b2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes
170b3(khri brgyad): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing / nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med
170b4(khri brgyad): pa/ ting nge 'dzin las/ skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes
170b5(khri brgyad): bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan
170b6(khri brgyad): gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
170b7(khri brgyad): pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes
170b8(khri brgyad): rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa
171a1(khri brgyad): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
171a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa
171a3(khri brgyad): thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes
171a4(khri brgyad): med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin
171a5(khri brgyad): no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gnas la yang gnas su
171a6(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams
171a7(khri brgyad): dang / las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas dang / rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
171a8(khri brgyad): du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan
171b1(khri brgyad): dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / thams cad tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
171b2(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
171b3(khri brgyad): rab tu shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa
171b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par
171b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /phyin chad 'di lta bu med do snyam du rab tu shes shing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
171b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
171b7(khri brgyad): nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa
171b8(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang
172a1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor
172a2(khri brgyad): gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig
172a3(khri brgyad): rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /
172a4(khri brgyad): bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang
172a5(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs
172a6(khri brgyad): po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
172a7(khri brgyad): su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang ngas gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten na/
172a8(khri brgyad): bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
172b1(khri brgyad): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma
172b2(khri brgyad): mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas gyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag
172b3(khri brgyad): go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar
172b4(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / ngas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par
172b5(khri brgyad): zad par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsgrubs kyang zag pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram
172b6(khri brgyad): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba
172b7(khri brgyad): thob cing / bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/ /tshangs
172b8(khri brgyad): pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /
173a1(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a2(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig
173a3(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
173a4(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad de/ bcwa brgyad gang zhe
173a5(khri brgyad): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs
173a6(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan nas/ gang gi nub mo phung po'i
173a7(khri brgyad): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i
173a8(khri brgyad): 'du shes med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran
173b1(khri brgyad): pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /
173b2(khri brgyad): lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad
173b3(khri brgyad): ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
173b4(khri brgyad): shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o/ /de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
173b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste / gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ gzungs
173b6(khri brgyad): kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa'o/ /de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni gzod
173b7(khri brgyad): ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir/ chos
173b8(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho'i lam skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming med pa'i
174a1(khri brgyad): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin
174a2(khri brgyad): no/ /da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang / dul bar gnas pa yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /
174a3(khri brgyad): Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /bA zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang
174a4(khri brgyad): dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ya zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir
174a5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed ba po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sa zhes
174a6(khri brgyad): bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /
174a7(khri brgyad): ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs
174a8(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /
174b1(khri brgyad): sha zhes bya ba ni zhi nas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni
174b2(khri brgyad): zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos
174b3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /sma zhes
174b4(khri brgyad): bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la spro ba mi
174b5(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /Tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin
174b6(khri brgyad): no/ /Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ska zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i
174b7(khri brgyad): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /dza zhes bya ba ni rga ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /
174b8(khri brgyad): Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/ /de yan chad ni yi ger brjod pa med
175a1(khri brgyad): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis rtogs par byed pa dang / gang gis mthong ba'i ming
175a2(khri brgyad): ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs
175a3(khri brgyad): kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa de ni sgra gang la yang thogs par mi 'gyur
175a4(khri brgyad): zhing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par gyur te/ sgra shes pa la mkhas pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a
175a5(khri brgyad): z hes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos la thos nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyis
175a6(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de la ni phan yon nyi shu yod pa shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur
175a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab
175a8(khri brgyad): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshegs chung ngus 'thob cing / som nyi med la/ yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag las tshig
175b1(khri brgyad): 'jam po thos na yang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur la/ tshig rtsub po thos na yang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/ mtho bar mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / tha mal par gnas par
175b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par
175b3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas
175b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes
175b5(khri brgyad): pa la mkhas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'gro ba la mkhas
175b6(khri brgyad): pa dang / ldog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon nyi shu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la
175b7(khri brgyad): 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //
175b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
176a1(khri brgyad): pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug po la spyod pa ni/ sa nas sar 'phar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a2(khri brgyad): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa/ sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am 'pho ba
176a3(khri brgyad): 'am/ nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyi sa gang yin pa de la yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi sems la/ sa yongs su sbyong bar yang byed de/ sa de yang yang dag par
176a4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas
176a5(khri brgyad): pas/ sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byas te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ phan pa bya
176a6(khri brgyad): ba'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs
176a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba
176a8(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod
176b1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom

176b3(khri brgyad): bcu po 'di dag bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/
176b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang / mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang / sems can
176b5(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis sri zhu che ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongs
176b6(khri brgyad): su 'tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
176b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas chog mi shes shing / de la yang yi ge la mngon par
176b8(khri brgyad): zhen par bya ba dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed la/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /
177a1(khri brgyad): yongs su bsngo la des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing des kyang rom sems su mi byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas shing /

177a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing de yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa yongs
177a4(khri brgyad): su mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs ba mi gtang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /
177a5(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / sems mi 'dre ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

177a7(khri brgyad): po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu yongs su spang bar bya'o/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su
177a8(khri brgyad): spang bar bya ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / bdag la bstod pa yongs su

178a1(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen pa dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la chags pa dang / sangs
178a2(khri brgyad): rgyas su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / dge 'dun du lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / tshul khrims su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang /

178b5(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing / bsam bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas

178b8(khri brgyad): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa dang / mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / cho rigs phun sum tshogs
179a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
