179a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
179a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
179a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /
179a6(khri brgyad): de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
179a7(khri brgyad): snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang
179a8(khri brgyad): zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ de ni gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs
179b1(khri brgyad): su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i dge
179b2(khri brgyad): ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sri zhu byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang
179b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi lhung ba
179b4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su
179b5(khri brgyad): sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang rab tu 'byung la/ su yang de'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni
179b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba
179b7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
179b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
180a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs kyang rung / mya ngan las 'das kyang rung sems can rnams la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/
180a2(khri brgyad): bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
180a3(khri brgyad): lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i
180a4(khri brgyad): chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su
180a5(khri brgyad): sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyi khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa gang gis nam yang rigs dma'
180a6(khri brgyad): ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
180a7(khri brgyad): bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
180a8(khri brgyad): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang bar bya ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/
180b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / gzhan yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims su byed pa/ byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub
180b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
180b3(khri brgyad): chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chung ngu zhig byas na yang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du chud mi gzon na/ chen po lta ci smos te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing
180b4(khri brgyad): byas pa tshor ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems med
180b5(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba
180b6(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa gsum po dag la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba yin
180b7(khri brgyad): no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181a1(khri brgyad): chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba dag tu 'dug la/ sems
181a2(khri brgyad): can de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bzhag gi bar du der gcad pa dang / gshag pa dang / brdung ba dang / btso ba dang / bsreg pa dag kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi
181a3(khri brgyad): phyir mngon par spro zhing yongs su mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la
181a4(khri brgyad): dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang
181a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
181a6(khri brgyad): yongs su tshol ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi
181a7(khri brgyad): shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams cad gzung
181a8(khri brgyad): bar bya'o snyam du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med
181b1(khri brgyad): par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub la yang re ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub
181b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i
181b3(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i dge
181b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
181b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan na/ sems can rnams
181b6(khri brgyad): kyang yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du nams
181b7(khri brgyad): kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel
181b8(khri brgyad): yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin no/ /de la
182a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni
182a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/
182a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182a5(khri brgyad): po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
182a6(khri brgyad): sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ gang la bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ de ni
182a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa
182a8(khri brgyad): ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
182b1(khri brgyad): gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
182b2(khri brgyad): bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na/ nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba yin no/ /
182b3(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/ gang rnam par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no/ /
182b4(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta
182b5(khri brgyad): ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs
182b6(khri brgyad): shing ngur smrig gyon pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
182b7(khri brgyad): 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma rnams dang se gol gtogs pa srid du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing de dag med na yang yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni
182b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/
183a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyis/ 'di
183a2(khri brgyad): la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i
183a3(khri brgyad): gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/
183a4(khri brgyad): de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bskyed par 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba yin
183a5(khri brgyad): no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ gang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i
183a6(khri brgyad): sems dang / rtsod pa'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
183a7(khri brgyad): bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/ /
183a8(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa
183b1(khri brgyad): yongs su spang ba yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod par byed na/ 'phags
183b2(khri brgyad): pa'i lam la lta ci smos shing / byang chub la lta ci smos pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
183b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos ci yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ gang gis lhag par rlom sems su byed pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar lhag pa'i
183b4(khri brgyad): nga rgyal spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
183b5(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ dngos po rnams mi
183b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
183b7(khri brgyad): mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183b8(khri brgyad): pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
184a1(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
184a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol du phyin
184a3(khri brgyad): pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/ shes bya'i rgya mtsho rnam pa lnga'i pha rol du phyin par gyur to/ /phyin to/ phyin par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod
184a4(khri brgyad): du med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol du phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang
184a5(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi
184a6(khri brgyad): lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /slong ba mthong na sems zhum par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
184a7(khri brgyad): na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas/ yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sems dang po bskyed
184a8(khri brgyad): phyin chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing / sems gsog tu mi bya ste/ chos drug po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yang
184b1(khri brgyad): bdag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems
184b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas/ chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
184b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos gang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya ste/
184b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i
184b5(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
184b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag rang
184b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par
184b8(khri brgyad): mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la
185a1(khri brgyad): lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la
185a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams
185a3(khri brgyad): gsum la chags par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas sangs
185a4(khri brgyad): rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos su lta ba la rten par mi
185a5(khri brgyad): bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos su lta ba la rten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
185a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshul khrims
185a8(khri brgyad): su lta ba la rten pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar
185b1(khri brgyad): yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
185b2(khri brgyad): chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong
185b3(khri brgyad): pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid
185b4(khri brgyad): rtogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o/ /de la
185b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes
185b6(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
185b7(khri brgyad): lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po thob pa'o/ /de la
185b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186a1(khri brgyad): po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul
186a2(khri brgyad): rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
186a3(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
186a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos gnyis su kun du spyod pa med pa nyid de/ de ni tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /
186a5(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang
186a6(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o/ /
186a7(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba
186a8(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug la btang snyoms su
186b2(khri brgyad): 'jog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi
186b3(khri brgyad): sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe
186b4(khri brgyad): na/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub
186b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/ sems can yongs su
186b7(khri brgyad): smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na sems can
186b8(khri brgyad): thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji
187a1(khri brgyad): lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su
187a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /
187a3(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ bya ba thams cad byed la de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug
187a4(khri brgyad): pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar byang chub
187a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems
187a6(khri brgyad): can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
187a7(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
187a8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
187b1(khri brgyad): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187b2(khri brgyad): chen pos sbobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
187b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
187b4(khri brgyad): rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
187b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/
187b6(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems
187b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar gyur pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/
187b8(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems
188a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub
188a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can bye
188a3(khri brgyad): ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing mngon par 'byung la/ sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
188a4(khri brgyad): mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba ni/ gser las grub pa/ sdong
188a5(khri brgyad): po ni bai dUr+ya las grub pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la/ yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag
188a6(khri brgyad): tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad
188a7(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
188a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
188b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol du phyin pa bcu po dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / bag chags
188b2(khri brgyad): dang mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la
188b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha
188b4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag
188b5(khri brgyad): par 'da' zhing / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang byang chub sems
188b6(khri brgyad): dpa'i sa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa
188b7(khri brgyad): bcu yin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sa yongs su sbyang
188b8(khri brgyad): ba bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni khams gsum nas nges par
189a1(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas par 'gyur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
189a2(khri brgyad): ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar
189a3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ nges par 'byung bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
189a4(khri brgyad): 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa
189a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/
189a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gog pa'i
189a7(khri brgyad): dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med
189a8(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
189b1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong
189b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs
189b3(khri brgyad): kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid
189b4(khri brgyad): la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab
189b5(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
189b6(khri brgyad): dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi
189b7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
189b8(khri brgyad): mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong
190a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /
190a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar dag kyang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin
190a3(khri brgyad): pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin
190a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pas sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas
190a5(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba dang rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam
190a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
190a7(khri brgyad): smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag cha'i rang bzhin ni brag cha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul
190a8(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la nges par 'byung
190b1(khri brgyad): bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
190b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par
190b3(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

190b5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
190b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
190b7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag
190b8(khri brgyad): la/ nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
191a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
191a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la
191a3(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur
191a4(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
191a5(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
191a6(khri brgyad): du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir
191a7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
191a8(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges
191b1(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
191b2(khri brgyad): 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
191b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra
191b4(khri brgyad): bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa
191b5(khri brgyad): de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin
191b6(khri brgyad): gyis stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
191b7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan
191b8(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
192a1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi
192a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi
192a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i
