227a7(khri brgyad): 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems
227a8(khri brgyad): dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs ni tshor
227b1(khri brgyad): ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs
227b2(khri brgyad): su med do/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni
227b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
227b4(khri brgyad): ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing
227b5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
227b6(khri brgyad): mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs
227b7(khri brgyad): so/ /sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
227b8(khri brgyad): lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni yid la med cing
228a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs
228a2(khri brgyad): ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la yang med cing mi
228a3(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /ro ni ro dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg bya ni reg bya dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni chos rnams dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni
228a4(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de dag la yang de med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
228a5(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de yang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig
228a6(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ni gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
228a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang de bzhin te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /
228a8(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la yang gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
228b1(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la yang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
228b2(khri brgyad): ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
228b3(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs
228b4(khri brgyad): so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
228b5(khri brgyad): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa
228b6(khri brgyad): nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po
228b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi
228b8(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
229a1(khri brgyad): ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa
229a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni rang
229a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha
229a4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs
229a5(khri brgyad): so/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
229a6(khri brgyad): ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
229a7(khri brgyad): dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
229a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
229b1(khri brgyad): gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa
229b2(khri brgyad): yin no/ /ming gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la/ stong pa
229b3(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/
229b4(khri brgyad): ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med
229b5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
229b6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /
229b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du
229b8(khri brgyad): ming du btags pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i
230a1(khri brgyad): bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang nang stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dngos po med
230a2(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs
230a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du
230a4(khri brgyad): btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
230a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
230a6(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
230a7(khri brgyad): rnams las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i
230a8(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las
230b1(khri brgyad): gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /
230b2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/
230b3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las
230b4(khri brgyad): skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de
230b5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan
230b6(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa
230b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
230b8(khri brgyad): ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/
231a1(khri brgyad): de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang /
231a2(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
231a3(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
231a4(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
231a5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par
231a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs
231a7(khri brgyad): na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
231a8(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
231b1(khri brgyad): ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par
231b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de
231b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bdag bdag ces bya ba yang bdag
231b4(khri brgyad): mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /
231b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
231b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las
231b7(khri brgyad): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos
231b8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
232a1(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i
232a2(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes
232a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni
232a4(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
232a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /
232a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
232a7(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni
232a8(khri brgyad): dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
232b1(khri brgyad): na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
232b2(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab
232b3(khri brgyad): 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
232b4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha
232b5(khri brgyad): na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas
232b6(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs
232b7(khri brgyad): des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
232b8(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags shes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
233a1(khri brgyad): pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
233a2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med
233a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /
233a4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
233a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba
233a6(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags shes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin
233a7(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin
233a8(khri brgyad): gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang
233b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /gang mngon par ma
233b2(khri brgyad): grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
233b3(khri brgyad): la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin
233b4(khri brgyad): pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma
233b5(khri brgyad): grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang
233b6(khri brgyad): gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
233b7(khri brgyad): du phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni
233b8(khri brgyad): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
234a1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
234a2(khri brgyad): shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su
234a3(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
234a4(khri brgyad): du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /
234a5(khri brgyad): yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang
234a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs
234a7(khri brgyad): brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang
234a8(khri brgyad): zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing
234b1(khri brgyad): chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe tshor ba
234b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /
234b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du de'i tshe/ mig khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
234b4(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas
234b5(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
234b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
234b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags
234b8(khri brgyad): so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par
235a1(khri brgyad): mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par
235a2(khri brgyad): mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
235a3(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
235a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid do/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan
235a5(khri brgyad): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de
235a6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
235a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag par
235a8(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong / pha rol du phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du
235b1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
235b2(khri brgyad): dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
235b3(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid
235b4(khri brgyad): ma lags so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lags so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
235b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang skye
235b6(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma
235b7(khri brgyad): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags
235b8(khri brgyad): so/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
236a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon
236a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs
236a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
236a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma
236a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du de
236a6(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med
236a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
236a8(khri brgyad): dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa
236b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
236b2(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom
236b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par
236b4(khri brgyad): shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang
236b5(khri brgyad): po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma
236b6(khri brgyad): mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'grib
236b7(khri brgyad): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
236b8(khri brgyad): du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
237a1(khri brgyad): dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags
237a2(khri brgyad): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis

237a4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer
237a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med
237a6(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni
237a7(khri brgyad): gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
237a8(khri brgyad): 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
237b1(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni
237b2(khri brgyad): gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
237b3(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis
237b4(khri brgyad): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
237b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
237b6(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha
237b7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
237b8(khri brgyad): so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab
238a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
238a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/ /chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she
238a3(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams
238a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
238a5(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi
238a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang /
238a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su
238a8(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
238b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
238b2(khri brgyad): ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
238b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
238b4(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
238b5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
238b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad po dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/
238b7(khri brgyad): de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di
238b8(khri brgyad): skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar
239a1(khri brgyad): mi rtog go/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar
239a2(khri brgyad): nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa
239a3(khri brgyad): med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag
239a4(khri brgyad): ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa zhi
239a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi
239a6(khri brgyad): rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
239a7(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces
239a8(khri brgyad): bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong
239b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya
239b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi
239b3(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ /dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/
239b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
239b5(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog
239b6(khri brgyad): go/ /bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
239b7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
239b8(khri brgyad): pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba
240a1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa
240a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
240a3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis
240a4(khri brgyad): stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
240a5(khri brgyad): bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
240a6(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang
240a7(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
240a8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
240b1(khri brgyad): bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
240b2(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i
240b3(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
240b4(khri brgyad): bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du yang
240b5(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
240b6(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba
240b7(khri brgyad): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod
240b8(khri brgyad): 'di skad du/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags
241a1(khri brgyad): so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
241a2(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags shes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
241a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
241a4(khri brgyad): dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /
241a5(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par
241a6(khri brgyad): rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med
241a7(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
241a8(khri brgyad): bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du
241b1(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ khyod 'di skad du gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni
241b2(khri brgyad): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang
241b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/
241b4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
241b5(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin
241b6(khri brgyad): no/ /gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du
241b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
241b8(khri brgyad): rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam
242a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
242a2(khri brgyad): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe
242a3(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /
242a4(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang /
242a5(khri brgyad): byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma
242a6(khri brgyad): mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
242a7(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi
242a8(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
242b1(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so
242b2(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i
242b3(khri brgyad): skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos
242b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs
242b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shA ri'i
242b6(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba
242b7(khri brgyad): med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun skye
242b8(khri brgyad): ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa
243a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
243a2(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang
243a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba
243a4(khri brgyad): med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang / nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur 'am/ de de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams
243a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur 'am/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga yang thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te
243a6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par
243a7(khri brgyad): bya/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
243a8(khri brgyad): kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir
243b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab
243b2(khri brgyad): 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par
243b3(khri brgyad): mi 'dod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs
243b4(khri brgyad): rgyas yod par mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
243b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag du med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes
243b6(khri brgyad): bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed na sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed
243b7(khri brgyad): par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la yang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes
243b8(khri brgyad): bskyed par 'gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing
244a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /chos
244a2(khri brgyad): ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob 'am/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor kyis
244a3(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci
244a4(khri brgyad): 'thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa dang /
244a5(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas
244a6(khri brgyad): kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang med/ dgra bcom pa yang med/
244a7(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
244a8(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa yang de lta yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba yang mi skye la
244b1(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa yang mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa yang brjod par spobs sam/
244b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so/ /chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la
244b3(khri brgyad): med do/ /chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang /
244b4(khri brgyad): brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
244b5(khri brgyad): gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/ spobs pa yang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/
244b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /chos ni skye ba med pa'o/ /gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /
244b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du
244b8(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
245a1(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de
245a2(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do/ /spobs pa skye ba med do/ /chos skye ba med do/ /gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
245a3(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
245a4(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad
245a5(khri brgyad): pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de
245a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa
245a7(khri brgyad): yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa skye/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
245a8(khri brgyad): ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
245b1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing
245b2(khri brgyad): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
245b3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
245b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang
245b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye 'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor kyis
245b6(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa yang mi skye la/ skyes pa yang mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skyes pa gang yin pa dang / ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin
245b7(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin
245b8(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
246a1(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams
246a2(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod
246a3(khri brgyad): par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las
246a4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
246a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni

246a7(khri brgyad): yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
246a8(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
246b1(khri brgyad): bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol
246b2(khri brgyad): na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

246b4(khri brgyad): phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
246b5(khri brgyad): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
246b6(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
246b7(khri brgyad): so/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka
246b8(khri brgyad): med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ /phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
247a1(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pas gzugs
247a2(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /
